com.wj.android.messageviewer.message

Class SMILMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wj.android.messageviewer.message.SMSMessage
      • com.wj.android.messageviewer.message.MMSMessage
        • com.wj.android.messageviewer.message.SMILMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessage, java.lang.Comparable<IMessage>

    public class SMILMessage
extends MMSMessage
    The SMILMessage is a MMSMessage extended by a SMIL document to organize the presentation.

    (SMIL = Synchronized Multimedia Integration Language) The concept of the SMILMessage means the ordering, layout, sequencing and timing of IMMSMessagePart on the terminal screen.

    The IMMSMessagePart of the SMILMessage must be referenced by the SMIL document, otherwise they might be ignored at the target terminal.

    Author:
    Werner Jaeger
